data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Jeena Sikho Lifecare Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 11 2025 the equity shares of Jeena Sikho Lifecare Ltd (Scrip Code: 544476) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250808-40 dated August 08 2025.
